# Plan Your Visit

###### Photo: Julia Featheringill

## Hours and Admission

The Addison Gallery of American Art, which is **free and open to the public** , is located in a stand-alone building on the campus of Phillips Academy at the corner of Route 28 [Main Street] and Chapel Avenue in Andover, Massachusetts, a 30-minute drive from Boston.

### Public Hours

Tuesday through Saturday: 10:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.  
Sunday: 1:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m.

Closed on Mondays, national holidays, December 24, and during the month of August.

Admission to all exhibitions is **free.**

To help increase cultural accessibility, we are proud to participate in the [Card to Culture](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116102443/https://massculturalcouncil.org/organizations/card-to-culture/) program, a collaboration between [Mass Cultural Council](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116102443/https://massculturalcouncil.org/) and the [Department of Transitional Assistance](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116102443/https://www.mass.gov/orgs/department-of-transitional-assistance), [Massachusetts Health Connector](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116102443/https://www.mahealthconnector.org/), and [Women, Infants & Children (WIC) Nutrition Program](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116102443/https://www.mass.gov/wic-information-for-participants). We welcome all EBT, WIC, SUN Bucks, and ConnectorCare cardholders to our exhibitions. See the full list of participating organizations offering [EBT](http://web.archive.o...
